name: Bindings of Faith
tooltip:
Bindings of FaithLevel 60

Father Inigo Montoy at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Bindings of Faith if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Bindings, 6 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 1 Arcane Crystal and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Bindings
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 6
- Arcane Crystal
- Nexus Crystal
